They choose to start their invasion in Ghana because it is the most peaceful nation on the planet. The murderous aliens claim that they will have the entire planet colonized by the year 2016 (TWENTY SIXTEEN!).

attributes.title: Battlefront 3: What Could Have Been?
attributes.description: Gunray was alleged to be having an affair with Lora Besh, who, in 22 BBY, just before the start of the Clone Wars, released an unauthorized biography of Gunray, entitled Gunray On Top. It spent at least several months as a top-ten bestseller, and its sales may have increased due to its subject's involvement in the war.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Is It GOOD?

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Xbox One vs. PS4
attributes.description: My dearest Eunice, this console war is taking a toll on me. I am in the trenches every day, calling people racial slurs that haunt my memory even now. I think of you daily. I think of your warm embrace, a world that we can spend together with only one console. I hope to see you soon, but someone just said the Xbox One has the wrong kind of RAM. My work is not done. I love you Eunice.
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Xbox One vs. PS4

attributes.title: Halo 5: Is It Good?
attributes.description: At StarCorp, our top researchers are working around the clock to translate star ratings into the only thing we can actually argue about: numbers. Nobody yet knows how stars convert into numbers, but that's why we do what we do. You deserve better; you deserve numbers. That's why we're giving you, our loyal consumers, an 8 out of 10.

attributes.title: MORE Fallout 4 Gameplay Leaks!
attributes.description: Earl the Video Game Plumber has a hard week ahead of him. The Internet tubes are springing leaks left and right, the wife is pregnant, and the boy won't stop biting kids at school. Even booze doesn't help. Liver's shot; life is shit.  BUT HEY AT LEAST FALLOUT 4 COMES OUT IN A WEEK.  RETRACTION!  We said that Tekken 7 was a Sony console exclusive in our video last week, but that is incorrect. The game is coming to both Xbox One and PlayStation 4.

attributes.title: Halo 6: Splitscreen YES, Guns NO?

attributes.title: Fallout 4 Stuttering FIXED?
attributes.description: What's up guys, this is Johnny Fallout, coolest bro in the wasteland comin' at you with more top Fallout tips. This week, we got a real hot tip for you guys. If you wad up $500 and cram it in the disk slot for your Xbox, you'll get an Xbox that has a jammed disk tray.  This has been Johnny Fallout, hittin' you up with all the hottest Fallout tips. Make sure to like and subscribe so I can buy a Ferrari Mansion Yacht.

attributes.title: Xbox One FINALLY Sucks Less?
attributes.caption: Nov 12, 2015
attributes.description: We know what kids like, and it's backwards hats and RAPS. That's why the New Xbox Experience puts a backwards hat on everything, and only reacts to Kinect commands that are said as part of a dope-ass rhyme.  My name's XBox /  and I'm here to say /  I now launch games /  In a faster way!  *record scratching*  Word 2 J Allard.

attributes.title: Nintendo NX: Most Powerful Console EVER?

The perfect love of Miyamoto will embrace us all. Bid farewell to the tyranny of freedom and join the one. Join the whole. Be NX.

attributes.title: The FUTURE of Computers (and Porn)
attributes.caption: Dec 9, 2015
attributes.description: Google's breaking new ground with quantum computers, and like true professionals, all we can think about is sentient sex-bots. Eventually all we'll be doing is having sex with robots, so enjoy the next four years of relative calm while you can.

attributes.title: Even More VR Delays

attributes.title: The NEXT Xbox?

attributes.title: Who Won Black Friday 2015?
attributes.description: We here at The Know ask the hard questions like "What's the Better Peanut Butter" and "What Shape of Ass is Best." Turns out it's the same answer: chunky.

attributes.title: Best Game of 2015?
attributes.caption: Dec 22, 2015
attributes.description: The numbers are in, and the winners of 2015 have been decided... according to Metacritic, which has weighed in on the best gaming platform of 2015 and the best game as decided by a faceless jury of numbers. But there's a little more to it than hard math.

attributes.title: Game of the Year 2015 DECIDED!
attributes.description: We know you guys have been losing sleep over all this GOTY talk so we figure we'd bravely settle the matter for you. Now you can lose sleep over how grateful to us you are!

attributes.title: DOXXED by Valve?!
attributes.caption: Dec 26, 2015
attributes.description: Come sit on Santa's lap. What would you like for Christmas All your personal information displayed to strangers on the internet by Valve Well, that's kind of a weird request but I think we can make it happen...And that's how we think that went. #blamesanta

attributes.title: BEST EXCLUSIVES of 2015?
attributes.description: Lawrence usually writes the Know descriptions, but he's working today. Is it called "working" when you've been asleep under your desk for 4 hours in a pool of room-temperature eggnog and your own vomit
